```py
>>> lst = ['a', 'a', 'b', 'b']
>>> ser = pd.Series([5, 10, 8, 14], index=lst)
>>> ser
a     5
a    10
b     8
b    14
dtype: int64
>>> ser.groupby(level=0).sem()
a    2.5
b    3.0
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> data = [[1, 12, 11], [1, 15, 2], [2, 5, 8], [2, 6, 12]]
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=["a", "b", "c"],
...                   index=["tuna", "salmon", "catfish", "goldfish"])
>>> df
 a   b   c
 tuna   1  12  11
 salmon   1  15   2
 catfish   2   5   8
goldfish   2   6  12
>>> df.groupby("a").sem()
 b  c
a
1    1.5  4.5
2    0.5  2.0 
```
